recipesJson.name: Kiwi-Berry Smoothie
recipesJson.author: BubbasBrewz
recipesJson.description:
Anybody else sit down at their vape bench and stare longlingly at your flavor stash, enjoying the aroma of whatever catches your eye at the time? My gf and I are in love with DIY and I wanted to get her involved in the recipe process. I had her choose three flavors that sounded good to her, and here we are. I think she's onto something.

Sweeten to taste
